main event: A Navy pilot reported observing a bright white light during a night flight near Lakehurst, New Jersey on November 7, 1950.
interesting points: The pilot initially thought the light was another aircraft's fuselage light,It appeared to climb at a high rate of speed, estimated at over 2000 feet per minute,The object maneuvered in a jerking manner, suggesting stabilization,The light had a diameter of about 10 to 15 inches,Multiple attempts were made to identify the object, but it disappeared without a trace.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: Navy pilot conducting a routine night flight
